subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The former Olympic gymnast Peter Vidmar stepped down as Team USA’s chef de mission after criticism of his opposition to same-sex marriage.
snippet: The former Olympic gymnast Peter Vidmar stepped down as Team USA’s chef de mission after criticism of his opposition to same-sex marriage.
